verses.text: It pleased \w Darius|strong="H1868"\w* \w to|strong="H1868"\w* set over \w the|strong="H1868"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w* \w an|strong="H4437"\w* hundred \w and|strong="H4437"\w* twenty satraps, which should be throughout \w the|strong="H1868"\w* whole \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*;

\w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w over|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w* three presidents, \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H1934"\w* one; \w that|strong="H1768"\w* these satraps \w might|strong="H1934"\w* give \w account|strong="H5922"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king should \w have|strong="H1934"\w* \w no|strong="H3606"\w* damage.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H4481"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* distinguished above \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* satraps, \w because|strong="H4481"\w* \w an|strong="H4430"\w* excellent spirit \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w him|strong="H4481"\w*; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* thought \w to|strong="H4481"\w* set \w him|strong="H4481"\w* \w over|strong="H5924"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* whole realm.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* satraps \w sought|strong="H1934"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* find occasion \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* touching \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4437"\w*; \w but|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w could|strong="H1768"\w* find \w none|strong="H3606"\w* occasion nor fault; \w forasmuch|strong="H3606"\w* \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w was|strong="H1934"\w* faithful, neither \w was|strong="H1934"\w* \w there|strong="H6903"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* error \w or|strong="H4430"\w* fault found \w in|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* said these \w men|strong="H4437"\w*, \w We|strong="H1768"\w* \w shall|strong="H4437"\w* \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w any|strong="H3606"\w* \w occasion|strong="H5931"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w this|strong="H1932"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, except \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w find|strong="H7912"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w against|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4437"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* presidents \w and|strong="H1841"\w* satraps assembled together \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* king, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* said \w thus|strong="H1836"\w* \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*, King Darius, live \w for|strong="H5922"\w* \w ever|strong="H3809"\w*.

\w All|strong="H5957"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w presidents|strong="H5632"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* kingdom, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* deputies \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* satraps, \w the|strong="H5922"\w* counsellors \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* governors, \w have|strong="H1868"\w* consulted \w together|strong="H7284"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* establish \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4430"\w* statute, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* strong interdict, \w that|strong="H5922"\w* whosoever shall ask \w a|strong="H3068"\w* petition \w of|strong="H4430"\w* any god \w or|strong="H4430"\w* man \w for|strong="H5922"\w* thirty days, save \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w he|strong="H3652"\w* shall \w be|strong="H5957"\w* cast into \w the|strong="H5922"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions.

\w Now|strong="H4430"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w establish|strong="H6966"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interdict, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* sign \w the|strong="H3606"\w* writing, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H4481"\w* be not changed, \w according|strong="H4481"\w* \w to|strong="H5705"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* law \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* altereth not.
Wherefore \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Darius \w signed|strong="H7560"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* interdict.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* when Daniel knew \w that|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w writing|strong="H3792"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, \w he|strong="H6903"\w* went into \w his|strong="H3606"\w* house; (\w now|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* windows were open \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* chamber toward Jerusalem;) \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w he|strong="H6903"\w* kneeled upon \w his|strong="H3606"\w* knees three times \w a|strong="H3068"\w* day, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* prayed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* gave thanks \w before|strong="H6903"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* God, \w as|strong="H3606"\w* \w he|strong="H6903"\w* did aforetime.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* \w these|strong="H1836"\w* men assembled together, \w and|strong="H1005"\w* found \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w making|strong="H3046"\w* petition \w and|strong="H1005"\w* supplication \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* God.

Then they \w came|strong="H7284"\w* near, \w and|strong="H1841"\w* spake \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* king concerning \w the|strong="H6925"\w* king’s interdict; Hast thou not signed an interdict, \w that|strong="H1400"\w* every \w man|strong="H1400"\w* \w that|strong="H1400"\w* shall make \w petition|strong="H1156"\w* \w unto|strong="H1156"\w* any god or \w man|strong="H1400"\w* within thirty days, save \w unto|strong="H1156"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* king, shall \w be|strong="H1841"\w* cast into \w the|strong="H6925"\w* den \w of|strong="H1156"\w* lions? \w The|strong="H6925"\w* king answered \w and|strong="H1841"\w* said, \w The|strong="H6925"\w* thing is true, according \w to|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* law \w of|strong="H1156"\w* \w the|strong="H6925"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H1841"\w* Persians, which altereth not.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w answered|strong="H6032"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w before|strong="H6925"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w That|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel, \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* children \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* captivity \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Judah, regardeth \w not|strong="H3809"\w* \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3809"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* interdict \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* hast \w signed|strong="H7560"\w*, \w but|strong="H3861"\w* \w maketh|strong="H1156"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* \w petition|strong="H1156"\w* three times \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w day|strong="H3118"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* heard \w these|strong="H4481"\w* words, \w was|strong="H1841"\w* sore displeased, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w set|strong="H7761"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* heart \w on|strong="H5922"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* deliver \w him|strong="H5922"\w*: \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* laboured till \w the|strong="H5922"\w* going down \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* sun \w to|strong="H5922"\w* rescue \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* these men assembled together \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, Know, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w it|strong="H5922"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* law \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* Medes \w and|strong="H4430"\w* Persians, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* no interdict nor statute \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* establisheth may \w be|strong="H1934"\w* changed.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* commanded, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* brought Daniel, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* cast \w him|strong="H5922"\w* into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions. \add Now \add*\w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* spake \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* Daniel, \w Thy|strong="H5922"\w* God \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H3606"\w* servest continually, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w will|strong="H1768"\w* deliver \w thee|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6032"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stone \w was|strong="H1841"\w* \w brought|strong="H1841"\w*, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* laid upon \w the|strong="H1768"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*; \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* sealed \w it|strong="H1932"\w* \w with|strong="H1841"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* own signet, \w and|strong="H6032"\w* \w with|strong="H1841"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* signet \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7804"\w* lords; \w that|strong="H1768"\w* nothing might \w be|strong="H1841"\w* changed concerning \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H1841"\w* \w to|strong="H5922"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* palace, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* passed \w the|strong="H5922"\w* night fasting: \w neither|strong="H3809"\w* \w were|strong="H1768"\w* instruments \w of|strong="H4430"\w* music \w brought|strong="H1841"\w* \w before|strong="H5922"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*: \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H5922"\w* sleep fled \w from|strong="H8133"\w* \w him|strong="H5922"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* arose very early \w in|strong="H5954"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* morning, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w went|strong="H5954"\w* \w in|strong="H5954"\w* haste \w unto|strong="H5922"\w* \w the|strong="H5922"\w* den \w of|strong="H4430"\w* lions.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w when|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w came|strong="H1768"\w* near unto \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w* \w to|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, \w he|strong="H1768"\w* cried with \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lamentable voice: \w the|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* spake \w and|strong="H4430"\w* said \w to|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Daniel, servant \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* living God, \w is|strong="H1768"\w* thy God, \w whom|strong="H1768"\w* \w thou|strong="H1768"\w* servest continually, able \w to|strong="H4430"\w* deliver thee \w from|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H1768"\w* lions?

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w said|strong="H6032"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w unto|strong="H6032"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, live \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever.

\w My|strong="H4430"\w* God \w hath|strong="H4430"\w* sent his angel, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w hath|strong="H4430"\w* shut \w the|strong="H5974"\w* lions’ mouths, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* they \w have|strong="H4430"\w* not hurt me: forasmuch as before \w him|strong="H5974"\w* innocency \w was|strong="H4430"\w* found \w in|strong="H4430"\w* me; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w also|strong="H4430"\w* before \w thee|strong="H5974"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w*, \w have|strong="H4430"\w* I done no hurt.

\w Then|strong="H6903"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* exceeding glad, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* commanded \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w should|strong="H4430"\w* take Daniel \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den. \w So|strong="H1768"\w* Daniel \w was|strong="H4430"\w* taken \w up|strong="H6925"\w* \w out|strong="H5648"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* den, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w no|strong="H3809"\w* \w manner|strong="H3606"\w* \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w hurt|strong="H2255"\w* \w was|strong="H4430"\w* \w found|strong="H7912"\w* upon \w him|strong="H6925"\w*, \w because|strong="H6903"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* trusted \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H7972"\w* God.

\w And|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* \w commanded|strong="H4481"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w brought|strong="H1841"\w* \w those|strong="H1768"\w* men \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w had|strong="H4430"\w* accused \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* cast \w them|strong="H5922"\w* into \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w* \w of|strong="H4481"\w* lions, \w them|strong="H5922"\w*, \w their|strong="H3606"\w* children, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* wives; \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions \w had|strong="H4430"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* mastery \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w them|strong="H5922"\w*, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* brake \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w their|strong="H3606"\w* bones \w in|strong="H5922"\w* pieces, \w or|strong="H3809"\w* \w ever|strong="H3809"\w* \w they|strong="H3606"\w* \w came|strong="H1768"\w* \w at|strong="H7912"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* bottom \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w den|strong="H1358"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1768"\w* \w king|strong="H4430"\w* Darius wrote \w unto|strong="H5705"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* peoples, nations, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* languages, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H4430"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* earth; Peace \w be|strong="H3809"\w* multiplied \w unto|strong="H5705"\w* \w you|strong="H1768"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1768"\w* make \w a|strong="H3068"\w* decree, \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w in|strong="H1753"\w* \w all|strong="H3606"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* dominion \w of|strong="H4430"\w* \w my|strong="H4430"\w* kingdom men tremble \w and|strong="H4430"\w* fear before \w the|strong="H3606"\w* God \w of|strong="H4430"\w* Daniel: \w for|strong="H1768"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* \w is|strong="H1768"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* \w living|strong="H1753"\w* God, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* stedfast \w for|strong="H1768"\w* ever, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* kingdom \w that|strong="H1768"\w* \w which|strong="H1768"\w* \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* not \w be|strong="H8001"\w* destroyed, \w and|strong="H4430"\w* \w his|strong="H3606"\w* dominion \w shall|strong="H3606"\w* \w be|strong="H8001"\w* \w even|strong="H1768"\w* \w unto|strong="H3790"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* end:

\w He|strong="H1768"\w* delivereth \w and|strong="H4437"\w* rescueth, \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w he|strong="H1768"\w* worketh signs \w and|strong="H4437"\w* wonders \w in|strong="H4437"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H4437"\w* \w in|strong="H4437"\w* earth; \w who|strong="H1768"\w* hath delivered \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* \w from|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* power \w of|strong="H4481"\w* \w the|strong="H3606"\w* lions.

\w So|strong="H1768"\w* \w this|strong="H4481"\w* \w Daniel|strong="H1841"\w* prospered \w in|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Darius, \w and|strong="H8065"\w* \w in|strong="H5648"\w* \w the|strong="H4481"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4481"\w* Cyrus \w the|strong="H4481"\w* Persian.
